00039 /**********************************************************************/
00040 // CONSTRUCTOR:  High (All fundamental information)
00041 /**********************************************************************/
00042 
00043 High::High(float aStartTime, float aDuration, int aType, char * aName)
00044   :Event(aStartTime, aDuration, aType, aName) {
00045 
00046   highID += 1;
00047   lowID = 0;
00048   bottomID = 0;
00049   Event::setStartTime(aStartTime);
00050   Event::setDuration(aDuration);
00051   Event::setType(aType);
00052   Event::setName(aName);
00053 
00054   double aDensity = .5;
00055   Event::setDensity(aDensity);
00056 }

00107 /*********************************************************************/
00108 // PUBLIC:  Print
00109 /*********************************************************************/
00110 void High::Print() {
00111 
00112   *outputFile << 
00113     "=================================================================="
00114         << endl;
00115   *outputFile << ":HIGH " << highID << ":  " << theName << endl;
00116   *outputFile << ":  StartTime:  " << setw(7)<< theStartTime * uPerSec << 
00117     " units  " << setw(8) << theStartTime << setw(4) << "sec" << endl;
00118   *outputFile << ":  Duration:   " << setw(7) << theDuration * uPerSec << 
00119     " units  " << setw(8) << theDuration << setw(4) <<"sec" << endl;
00120 }
